main_definition: The highest point or maximum level of something.

meanings_and_examples.example: After months of training, John finally reached the peak of his athletic ability.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Summit or topmost part of a mountain
meanings_and_examples.example: We hiked to the peak and enjoyed breathtaking views from the summit.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The most intense point in a process, situation, etc.
meanings_and_examples.example: Her career reached its peak when she was awarded manager of the year.
Our company has peaked at 100 million sales this year.
